      • switchHexagon

        protected void switchHexagon(Pos from,
                             Pos to,
                             boolean fromBot,
                             boolean toBot,
                             boolean fromEditor,
                             boolean toEditor)
        Switches the content of two hexagons
        Parameters:
        from - Cell of the first hexagon
        to - Cell of the second hexagon
        fromBot - True if the first hexagon belongs to a container
        toBot - True if the second hexagon belongs to a container
        fromEditor - True if the first hexagon belongs to an EditorContainer
        toEditor - True if the second hexagon belongs to an EditorContainer

                              boolean isEditor)
        Prepares the Payload with the source Cell data
        Parameters:
        payload - Payload to be prepared
        rend - MapRenderer corresponding to the object containing the source cell
        mouseCell - Source Cell
        isBot - True if the source cell belongs to a Container
        isEditor - True if the source cell belongs to an EditorContainer
